sentences.sContent: Journalists will be able to preview the exhibition tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 新闻记者明天将可以参观预展。

phrases.pCn: 影片未公开宣布的预演；内部预映；试映

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + view(观看) → 预先看到的演出 → 预演

trans.tranOther: to see or describe something before it is shown to the public
an occasion when you can see a film, play, painting etc before it is shown to the public
